title: Unexpected Adventures
description: Order and routine is introverted Abby’s motto, so when she’s being pushed to step out of her comfort zone, meeting hunky Shaun may be just the catalyst she needs.Their swift attraction to one another leads to new adventures that include paragliding, tattooing, and, yeah—Abby relinquishing her virginity.Laugh along with Abby as she discovers how fun it can be to step off her straight line.
author: Laura M. Baird
